title: Log in is not working
body:
Hello,
it is currently 10 am and i am trying to log in to league, and the client succesfully reads my password as valid, but once this happens, my client reads "logging on..." and does nothing for a much longer time than normal. Then a small screen that says "Connection Error" pops up and it closes my client when i click ok.... please help i just wanna play some league haha

- Best{{champion:157}} NA

replies.body:
Hey guys,

What ISP are you using?

Also are you trying on the NA or OCE platform? (this is the OCE boards)...
Same here please help i thought i was the only one
